#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;
char s[20001][21];
int cmp(void const *p1 , void const *p2){
    char *a=(char *)p1;
    char *b=(char *)p2;
    return strcmp(a,b);
}
int main()
{
    int n,m,i;
    int a[20001],cnt;
    while(1)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            a[i]=0;
        }
        if(n==0&&m==0)
        break;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                scanf("%s",&s[i]);
        qsort(s,n,21,cmp);
        //sort(s,s+n,cmp);
        cnt=1;
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            if(strcmp(s[i],s[i+1])==0)
            {
                cnt++;
            }

            else
            {
                a[cnt]++;
                cnt=1;
            }

        }
        a[cnt]++;
       /* cout<<endl;
        for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
        cout<<s[i]<<endl;*/


        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        cout<<a[i]<<endl;

    }
    return(0);
}
